# [Group] _cache redis firewall-rule_

Manage Firewall Rules for cache

## Commands

- [create](/Commands/cache/redis/firewall-rule/_create.md)
: Create a redis cache firewall rule

- [delete](/Commands/cache/redis/firewall-rule/_delete.md)
: Delete a single firewall rule in a specified redis cache.

- [list](/Commands/cache/redis/firewall-rule/_list.md)
: List all firewall rules in the specified redis cache.

- [show](/Commands/cache/redis/firewall-rule/_show.md)
: Get a single firewall rule in a specified redis cache.

- [update](/Commands/cache/redis/firewall-rule/_update.md)
: Update a redis cache firewall rule
